name: Individual Investigations in Photography
description: Students develop a critically informed photography practice by integrating the history and theory of photography with their production of original work in either an analogue or digital format. Students prepare a presentation comparing two Canadian and/or international MFA programs, in addition to preparing responses to readings and technical assignments. [144P]
prerequisites: FAS347Y5 or FAS349Y5 or FAS359Y5 or FAS369Y5, 1.5 credits in FAH/VCC and P.I.
